title: Heráldica Script
content:
About **[Heráldica Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141307/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/her%C3%A1ldica-script/)**

We are proud to add a very complex and new font to our collection.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141307im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typophileheraldica_4167.png)

Ornamented scripts are a Koziupa/Paul specialty, and Heraldica is one of their most expressive. It attains the very definition of deluxe by conjoining the classic thin-and-thick script treatment with thin-only counterpart strokes, then it goes the extra mile with a varied complement of overlaid flourishes. The usual assortment of multiple alternates and ending forms pushes it even further in class and versatility.

Monograms, logos, jewelry packaging and book covers are only a few of the possibilities with such a high-end script.

Visit our gallery called "The Art Room" at [http://bit.ly/11hRyvx](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141307/http:/bit.ly/11hRyvx "http://bit.ly/11hRyvx")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141307im_/http:/typophile.com/files/400_4253.png)

Typeface design: Angel Koziupa & Ale Paul for **[Sudtipos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141307/http:/www.sudtipos.com/)**.  
License the typeface with a Lted. Time 30% exclusive discount **[here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141307/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/her%C3%A1ldica-script/)**.
author: Ale Paul
